name: nytimes
text:
At one South Korean hotel, 300 quarantined foreigners are met with loud daily protests from local residents, who want them out.

"This is a hotel that produced a confirmed Covid-19 case. Shut it down immediately!” a large banner outside the hotel reads. https://t.co/CJ00u5xel5

text:

name: nytimes
text: "In the American caste system, the signal of rank is what we call race, the division of humans on the basis of their appearance. In America, race is the primary tool and the visible decoy for caste," @Isabelwilkerson writes for @NYTmag. https://t.co/vVmN9U3XPV
